New Records: Finn Allen equaled a World Record feat by hitting 16 sixes in the third T20I against Pakistan, matching Hazratullah Zazai's effort against Ireland in Dehradun in February 2019.
Finn Allen posted the highest score by a Kiwi in men's T20I internationals with 137 from 62 balls, beating Brendon McCullum's 123 (72) against Bangladesh in Pallekele in 2012.
Key Match Events: New Zealand posted 224/7 in 20 overs at the University Oval, with Tim Seifert's 31 (23) the next best as Finn Allen stole the show.
Finn Allen fell to Zaman Khan a ball after passing the 200 mark with an Allen six off the first ball of the 18th over.
Miscellaneous Highlights: New Zealand went on to beat Pakistan by 45 runs.
Suzie Bates' 124 against South Africa in 2020 is New Zealand's best in Women's T20Is.
